Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters

Token filters, which indicate portions of text to be tokenised as a single block, regardless of the statistical model (if it exists).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TokenFilter
    A filter that takes raw text, and finds tokens in the text (which are indicated by placeholders).
    Note that, in addition to indicating tokens, it is possible to stipulate that a sentence boundary will never be detected inside a placeholder.
    Note that the tokeniser might still join the "atomic tokens" defined by the token filter into larger tokens.
    TokenFilterService  
    TokenPlaceholder
    A place-holder that will be replaced by a proper token when tokenising.
    TokenRegexFilter
    A token filter which recognises a token based on a regular expression.
    TokenSequenceFilter
    A filter for applying a given transformation to a TokenSequence.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiacriticRemover
    Removes all diacritics from text.
    LowercaseFilter
    Puts text in lower case.
    LowercaseKnownFirstWordFilter
    Transforms a word into lower-case if it is a known word in the lexicon, and if it is at the start of a sentence or just following a quote.
    LowercaseKnownWordFilter
    Transforms a word with at least an initial uppercase letter into lower-case as long as it is a known word in the lexicon.
    QuoteNormaliser
    Normalises all unicode characters representing some sort of double quote to simple double quote, some sort of single quote to a simple apostrophe, and some sort of dash or hyphen to a simple minus sign.
    TokenFilterServiceLocator  
    UppercaseSeriesFilter
    Looks for a series of 2+ words in all upper-case, and transforms them into lower-case.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters Description

Token filters, which indicate portions of text to be tokenised as a single block, regardless of the statistical model (if it exists).
